pullRequest.title: Incremental scan followups
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes: #765: This addresses the following follow-ups from #315

Have validations on snapshot id range
Improve tests for the same

commit.message:
Incremental scan followups

Fixes: #765: This addresses the following follow-ups from #315

1. Have validations on snapshot id range
2. Improve tests for the same

nodes.bodyText:
I'd like to avoid using argument names in error messages. Argument names aren't very readable for end users because they are dense and this practice requires changing strings and test cases if arguments get renamed later.
How about "From and to snapshot IDs cannot be the same: (%s, %s]", "From snapshot does not exist: %s", etc.
